name: Advanced Search Disabler
author: LetoWPDev

sections.description:
Advanced Search Disabler allows you to specifically deactivate the search function on your WordPress website.

Advanced Search Disabler

With the Advanced Search Disabler, you can set specific settings for your website’s search functionality.

You can disable search for:

* The entire website
* Users who are not logged in
* Or exclude specific posts

It’s all easy to configure, and you can find the settings under the menu “Settings -> Advanced Search Disabler.”

Visit us at LetoWP

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
